::Darkafte::

"Poor Idiot" said Darkfate.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> For your information, Robo, Hunter is a Maximal, not an Alliance 
> member.
> 
> ::Killfest/Darkmouse::
> 
> Killfest raises an eyebrow. "An Alliance bot attacked four fully-
> armed warriors? He must have been insane."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Darkmouse looks at Dollen, a bit concerned. "You allright?" She 
asks, 
> reffering to his wounds.
> 
> 
>

> > ::Epyon::
> >

> > "If we end up needing to pull out, my base is fully functional, 
and

> >

he

its

made
